Detailed Description

Main configuration file included by all configuration pages.

Definition in file conf.php.

Function Documentation

PrintNVPForm ( $  values  ) 

Displays an NVP configuration form, usually a textbox and buttons.

This function is used in all configuration pages to modify module parameters. Params can be enabled/disabled, and values can be changed.

Parameters:
[in] $values array All of the NVPs in $Config struct at once

Todo:
Is there a way to get browser's current font width to use here?

00051     foreach ($values as $name => $valueconf) {
